Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 13 Piṭṭhiduka » 13.3 Dassanenapahātabbahetukaduka » 13.3.7 Pañhāvāra
13.3.7.3 Paccayānulomapaccanīya
Piṭṭhiduka
Dassanenapahātabbahetukaduka
Pañhāvāra
Paccayānulomapaccanīya
91.
4263Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe cha, naadhipatiyā cha, naanantare cha, nasamanantare cha, naaññamaññe dve, naupanissaye cha…pe…  nasampayutte dve, navippayutte tīṇi, nonatthiyā cha, novigate cha.
<< Suddhaup13.3.7.4 Paccayapaccanīyānuloma >>
